about_the_game:
Introduction

「Touhou: Tales of the Scarlet」is a Roguelike Deckbuilder. You will play as Flandre Scarlet to initiate a “Scarlet Moon Incident” and duel with gensokyo girls. The game strategies are not limited to attacking, defending, and moving. Make good use of knock-backs and duplicates, and effectively deal with the unique map mechanism, and let the scarlet moonlight shine upon this land!

Features

  • 50+ unique battles, we have carefully designed battle performances for each character.

  • 6 unique battle scenes, experience using strategies to fight at various scenic spots in Gensokyo.

  • 10 boss battles, against Gensokyo girls who master powerful spell cards.

  • Card construction ideas unique to Flandre Scarlet, 200+ usable cards.
